purpose: The email announces the 9th International Conference on Information Technology & Systems (ICITS'26) to be held in Roatán Island, Honduras, from February 16-18, 2026. It invites researchers and practitioners to submit original papers in English, Spanish, or Portuguese on various topics related to Information Technology & Systems. The email outlines submission guidelines, review processes, and important dates for paper submission and registration. Accepted papers will be published in respective proceedings based on the language of submission, with specific indexing details provided.

infos:
Conference on Information Technology & Systems | Roatán Island, Honduras
From: SEWORLD Moderator <[log in to unmask]>
Reply-To:[log in to unmask]
Date:Wed, 16 Jul 2025 06:14:35 -0000
Content-Type:text/plain

ICITS'26 - 9th International Conference on Information Technology & Systems, to be held at Universidad Tecnológica de Honduras, Roatán Island, Honduras, between the 16th and the 18th of February 2026, is an international forum for researchers and practitioners to present and discuss the most recent innovations, trends, results, experiences and concerns in the several perspectives of Information Technology & Systems.
We are pleased to invite you to submit your original papers to ICITS'26.
D) Software Systems, Architectures, Applications and Tools (SSAAT);
F) Computer Networks, Mobility and Pervasive Systems (CNMPS);
H) Big Data Analytics and Applications (BDAA);
M) Media, Applied Technology and Communication (MATC).

Submitted papers written in Spanish or Portuguese (until 15-page limit) must comply with the format of RISTI - Revista Ibérica de Sistemas e Tecnologias de Informação (download instructions/template for authors in Spanish or Portuguese), must not have been published before, not be under review for any other conference or publication and not include any information leading to the authors’ identification.
The authors of papers accepted as posters must build and print a poster to be exhibited during the Conference.

To ensure that a paper accepted as paper is published, at least one of the authors must be fully registered by the 5th of November 2025, and the paper must comply with the suggested layout and page-limit.
One registration permits only the participation of one author in the conference.
Payment of Registration, to ensure the inclusion of an accepted paper in the conference proceedings: November 19, 2025.

conf_name_candidates.raw: ICITS'26 - 9th Int. Conference on Information Technology & Systems
conf_name_candidates.evidence: ICITS'26 - 9th Int. Conference on Information Technology & Systems
